org.imageterrier.structures.indexing

Class QuantiserIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.imageterrier.structures.indexing.QuantiserIndex

  • public class QuantiserIndex
extends Object
    An index structure for an vector quantiser (an OpenIMAJ SpatialClusterer) which can be used to quantise features into visual terms.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
